name: Fists Of Rage
description:
The more Rage you have, the worse it is

This is a classic beat-em-up clone for the Ludum Dare 40 Game Jam. The game mechanic is simple. 

The worse the rage, the better the punch but you'll get hurt. The more calmer you are, you'll never get hurt! 

This game is difficult to play!

Controls

  • WASD - Movement
  • J - Punch (Button Mash)
  • K - Block (Hold)
  • M - Mute Music

Mechanics

  • You won't get hurt until your raging out
  • Raging out will increase your punch
  • Blocking will prevent any incoming punches, and may eventually calm you down.
